meanings.definition: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed bacitracin to fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: I applied bacitracin to my wound to prevent it from getting worse.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the mighty bacitracin!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like bacitracin, killing the negativity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The bacitracin worked like a superhero, defeating the bacteria invaders.

meanings.definition: A medication applied topically to prevent infection in minor cuts and scrapes.
meanings.sent1: After cleaning the cut, I applied bacitracin to keep it from getting infected.
meanings.sent2: Always carry bacitracin in your first aid kit for minor injuries.
meanings.sent3: The bacitracin was like a shield, protecting the wound from harm.
meanings.sent4: Her care was a soothing bacitracin to his wounded heart.
meanings.sent5: The bacitracin formed a protective barrier, keeping the cut safe from germs.
